#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>

int N, K;
long long A[100002];

int cmp(void const *a, void const *b)
{
	return (*(int *)a - *(int *)b);
}

int binsearch(int value)
{
	int low = 0, high = N - 1, mid;

	while (low <= high)
	{
		mid = low + ((high - low) / 2);
		if (A[mid] > value)
			high = mid - 1;
		else if (A[mid] < value)
			low = mid + 1;
		else
			return 1;
	}
	return 0;
}

int main()
{
	int i, c, temp;

	scanf("%d%d", &N, &K);

	for (i = 0; i < N; i++)
		scanf("%lld", &A[i]);

	qsort(A, N, sizeof(long long), cmp);

	i = c = 0;

	while (i < N)
	{
		temp = A[i] - K;

		if (binsearch(temp))
			c++;

		i++;
	}

	printf("%d\n", c);

	return 0;
}
